---
node_id: 34
title: Overall Integration Test (34)
---
### An integration test to ensure a given folder correctly loads ChromaDB, transcript history, and markdown files, by verifying each module's state.

An overall integration test will check that if we start up with a given folder that has a ChromaDB, a transcript history, and markdown files, it can load all three correctly. This test will verify that each module has the state that it should.
